title: @c15t/cli: c15t's CLI
description: CLI for rapid c15t setup. Scaffold React and Next.js cookie banners and a preferences centre, generate types and config, and run migration tooling for self-hosted deployments.
features: Configuration Generation: Automatically generate schema and code for consent management
Database Migrations: Simplified database schema updates
Multi-Framework Support: Works seamlessly across different web frameworks
Interactive CLI: User-friendly command-line interface with guided workflows
GitHub Integration: Easy way to star and support the project
Documentation Access: Quick access to project documentation
prerequisites: npm, pnpm, or yarn package manager
usage: Run `@c15t/cli generate` to create initial configuration
Customize consent settings in generated files
Use `@c15t/cli migrate` for database schema updates

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate schema/code based on your c15t config

commands.name: migrate
commands.description: Run database migrations based on your c15t config

commands.name: github
commands.description: Open the project's GitHub repository to star the project

commands.name: docs
commands.description: Open the c15t documentation in your browser

telemetry.description: Anonymous usage data collection to help improve the CLI
details: Used to prioritize features and improvements
